1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jasrah said:"Umm Salamah told me: 'The Messenger of Allah entered the courtyard of this mosque and called out at the top of his voice: 'The mosque is not permissible for anyone who is sexually impure or any woman who is menstruating

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي مَا جَاءَ فِي اجْتِنَابِ الْحَائِضِ الْمَسْجِدَ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning menstruating women keeping away from the mosque
